- Outdoor central AC condenser unit; exterior steel cabinet on ground near the building.
- Manufacturer: Ingersoll Rand; AHRI/ETL listed.
- Electrical: Minimum Circuit Ampacity 10.4 A; max fuse/breaker 15 A.
- Safety labels: Hazardous voltage warning; service disconnect should be available before servicing.
- Condition: Cabinet shows typical wear; one mounting screw area shows light corrosion. No visible structural damage.
